actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

official_title: A bill to deny Social Security benefits to individuals deported or ordered deported on the basis of association with the Nazi Government of Germany during World War II.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of OASDI benefits to individuals who have been deported pursuant to the Immigration and Nationality Act because of activities conducted under the direction of or in association with the Nazi government of Germany or its allies.

titles.title: A bill to deny Social Security benefits to individuals deported or ordered deported on the basis of association with the Nazi Government of Germany during World War II.
